original_text: Then the Lord showed this vision to me. The Lord God was standing next to a wall. In his hand was a string with a heavy weight on its end. The Lord was hanging the string down the wall. He was looking to see whether the wall was straight.
korean_text: 또 내게 보이신 것이 이러하니라 다림줄을 가지고 쌓은 담 곁에 주께서 손에 다림줄을 잡고 서셨더니

sentences.original_text: Then the Lord showed this vision to me
sentences.korean_translation: 그 때 주님께서 이 환상을 나에게 보여주셨습니다

sentences.original_text: The Lord God was standing next to a wall
sentences.korean_translation: 주 하나님께서 벽 곁에 서 계셨습니다

sentences.original_text: In his hand was a string
with a heavy weight on its end
The Lord was hanging the string down the wall
sentences.korean_translation: 주님께서 실을 벽에 내리며 매달고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: He was looking to see whether the wall was straight
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 벽이 곧은지 확인하기 위해 보고 있었습니다
